title: 20 minute waits when my game crashes
body: Why do I have to wait 20 minutes when my game crashes and wont connect back? This hardly seems fair since it wasn't my fault, it was your stupid client messing up like it always does. Please fix.

replies.body:
Regardless of the reason you were inactive from the game, your absence negatively impacts **everyone in the match**. This happens to be a big reason why the system treats all disconnections equally and why we cannot modify Leaverbuster penalties for any reason.

If you can provide more details regarding your crash, such as error message or what you experience during the crash, I can assist you in troubleshooting the cause.
